title: More (iPhone)
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And is not a fresh install or first run

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user launches the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the 'More' tab in the bottom rightmost location

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user taps the More tab 
and the user is signed into a MiLB.com account
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then they will be taken to the More page which will have a list of table cells that are as follows: 

Sections
-Stats
-Teams
-Player Search
-Gameday Audio
-MiLB.com Podcast
-MiLBStore.com
-MiLB Auctions
-Prospect Watch
-PlayBall.org

Help
-First Pitch FAQ
-Subscription Management
-Contact Us

About
-About MiLB.com
-Blackout Restrictions
-Privacy Policy
-Terms and Conditions

Apps & Games
-MLB At Bat
-MLB Ballpark
-Franchise MVP

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user taps the More tab 
and the user is not signed into a MiLB.com account
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then they will be taken to the More page which will have a list of table cells that are as follows: 

Subscribe to MiLB.TV

Sections
-Stats
-Teams
-Player Search
-Gameday Audio
-MiLB.com Podcast
-MiLBStore.com
-MiLB Auctions
-Prospect Watch
-PlayBall.org

Help
-First Pitch FAQ
-Subscription Management
-Contact Us

About
-About MiLB.com
-Blackout Restrictions
-Privacy Policy
-Terms and Conditions

Apps & Games
-MLB At Bat
-MLB Ballpark
-Franchise MVP

custom_steps_separated.content: When selecting "Subscribe to MiLB.TV" at the top of the menu
custom_steps_separated.expected: User is brought to paywall where user can sign up for "Yearly" or "Monthly" and Login to a user's pre-existing account.

custom_steps_separated.content: When selecting "Subscribe to MiLB.TV" at the top of the menu and then selecting Login
custom_steps_separated.expected: User can properly sign into their accounts

custom_steps_separated.content: When selecting "Subscribe to MiLB.TV" at the top of the menu and then selecting "Restore Now"
custom_steps_separated.expected: Apple Id prompt will appear and then the user will be able to restore their own account

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the Teams button
custom_steps_separated.expected: The user is taken to the list of teams separated by affiliate, class and option to view all MiLB teams

custom_steps_separated.content: When we select the Gameday Audio
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then 'Gameday Audio' will open in an internal webview
And will listed all the available team feeds

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the 'About MiLB.com' button found under the ABOUT section
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then they are taken to the 'About MiLB.com' page

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps any of the links under Help
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then their respective pages should open
- First Pitch FAQ (internal webview)
- Subscription Management (internal webview)
- Contact Us (external webview)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps any of the links under About
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then their respective pages should open in an internal webview
- About MiLB.com
- Blackout Restrictions, 
- Privacy Policy, 
- Terms and Conditions

title: Settings (iPhone)
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And is not a fresh install or first run

custom_steps_separated.content: when the user launches the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the 'More' tab in the bottom rightmost location

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps Settings located in the upper right hand corner
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then they will be taken to the Settings page which contains:
- MiLB.com Account
- Set Home Screen Icon
- Notifications
- Connect Purchase to MiLB.com
- About First Pitch
- Screen Auto-Lock

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on MiLB.com Account
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user is taken to the MiLB.com Account which contains:
- < Settings
- Email
- Password
- Privacy Policy
- Forgot Password?

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on Home Screen Icon
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user is taken to the Home Screen Icon which contains:
- < Settings
- Option to select a team icon
- Reset to MiLB icon
- Favorite Team (if applicable)
- List of teams by League

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on Notifications
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user is taken to Notifications page which contains the following:
- Notifications toggle
- New toggle
- Favorite team (if applicable)
- List of teams in alphabetical order

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on Connect Purchase to MiLB.com
When the user taps About First Pitch
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then they are taken to the About First Pitch which contains:
- Application version
- Build Number
- Device
- Model
- iOS Version
- Network
- Carrier
- Email
- ID1, ID2, ID3, etc.
- pt
- Email Logs

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user taps About First Pitch
And taps on the Email Logs
And user does not have e-mail installed on the device
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is taken to At Bat 11.1 FAQ webview

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user changes the Screen Auto-Lock setting to On
And lets the device sit for the amount of time set in the device settings for Auto-Lock
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the device will auto-lock after the amount of time set for Auto-Lock in the device settings

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user changes the Auto-Lock setting to Off
And lets the device sit for the amount of time set in the device settings for Auto-Lock
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the device will NOT Auto-Lock after the amount of time set for Auto-Lock in the device settings

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user makes a change to a setting
And backgrounds, then kills the application
When the user relaunches the app
And navigates back to the settings page
custom_steps_separated.expected: The settings the user changed should be preserved

title: More Section (iPad)
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And is not a fresh install or first run

custom_steps_separated.content: when the user launches the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the 'More' tab on the bottom right of the screen

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the 'More' tab on the bottom right of the screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
MiLB More Menu will be launched which will have a list of table cells that are tappable including: 
-Subscribe to MiLB.TV(Lite user only)
-Scoreboard
-News
-Videos
-Standings
-Team Schedules
-Players
-Stats
-Gameday Audio
-MiLB.com Podcast
Help
-Contact Us
About
-MiLB.com
-MiLB.com FAQ
-Blackout Restrictions
-Privacy Policy
-Terms and Conditions
Apps & Games

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the settings link in the top right of the more menu page
custom_steps_separated.expected: Settings page wil launch

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user makes a change to a setting
And backgrounds, then kills the application
When the user relaunches the app
And navigates back to the settings page
custom_steps_separated.expected: The settings the user changed should be preserved

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user changes the Auto-Lock setting to On
And lets the device sit for the amount of time set in the device settings for Auto-Lock
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the device will auto-lock after the amount of time set for Auto-Lock in the device settings

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user changes the Auto-Lock setting to Off
And lets the device sit for the amount of time set in the device settings for Auto-Lock
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the device will NOT Auto-Lock after the amount of time set for Auto-Lock in the device settings

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the 'About MiLB.com' button found under the ABOUT section
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then they are taken to the 'About MiLB.com' page

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps any of the links under Help and About
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then their respective pages should open either in a new window or within the app. (Test Contact Info, Blackout Restrictions, MiLB.com FAQ, About MiLB.com, Privacy Policy, Terms and Conditions)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN we select Gameday Audio
AND we have tapped on Yes for the Leave First Pitch dialog box
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the MiLB Gameday Audio page will open

custom_steps_separated.content: when selecting "Subscribe to MiLB.TV" at the top of the menu
custom_steps_separated.expected: User is brought to paywall where user can sign up for "Yearly" or "Monthly" and Login to a user's pre-existing account.

custom_steps_separated.content: when selecting "Subscribe to MiLB.TV" at the top of the menu and then selecting Login
custom_steps_separated.expected: User can properly sign into their accounts

custom_steps_separated.content: when selecting "Subscribe to MiLB.TV" at the top of the menu and then selecting "Restore Now"
custom_steps_separated.expected: Apple Id prompt will appear and then the user will be able to restore their own account
